name: Motorhead
overview: A vertically scrolling shoot'em up created by Joakim Axmon (Joe) and published in Game On 1989/08. A vehicle shooter, dodge the tanks, mines copters, jets strafing, blow them up before they can get a bead on you. For some reason you must also avoid whatever anvils must be at the base of bushes and foliage and walls of all sorts.
